pr_title: [TE] migrate logging from logback to log4j2

timeline.message: [TE] migrate logging from logback to log4j2

timeline.bodyText: Can't we set the log level in log4j2?
timeline.author: akshayrai

replies.bodyText: We are using slf4j for logger across the codebase and there is no way to set the log level in runtime with slf4j. Also, this class is standalone and actually never uses any logger inside. If we want to set the log level, we can always specify log4j2 config when run this class, which is common practice for log4j2.
replies.author: vincentchenjl
akshayrai
